turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about 1 News.
turn.1: When does the program 1 News at Midday start
turn.2: It airs every weekday at 12:00pm on TVNZ 1 and competed with TV3's "Newshub Midday" until "Newshub" discontinued its midday bulletin in July 2016, making "1 News at Midday" the only midday television news bulletin in New Zealand. "1 News at Six" is "1 News" flagship hour-long bulletin, and airs nightly at 6 pm and is fronted by Simon Dallow and Wendy Petrie on weekdays and Melissa Stokes on the weekend.
turn.3: Who does the weather and sports
turn.4: Sport is presented by Jenny-May Clarkson or Chris Chang, and weather by Daniel Corbett or Renee Wright.
turn.6: The bulletin is usually structured like this:   "1 News Tonight" is a half-hour long bulletin that airs at approximately 10:30 pm on TVNZ 1 each weeknight, and is usually hosted by Jenny Suo.
turn.7: What does the program compete with
turn.10: "Seven Sharp" is a half-hour current affairs programme which airs at 7 pm each weekday.
turn.12: Presented by Hilary Barry and Jeremy Wells, it features mostly current event or local human interest stories.
